question1: Agent 401, the satellite signal repeats itself in layers. Start from the smallest number and climb back up. Each level hides a small number, but the top of the tower reveals the real key.
question2: The Phantom likes to leave traps in file names. Even-numbered files reveal their first letter, odd-numbered files their second-to-last. Only by picking the correct letters will the next door unlock.
question3: The Phantom sabotaged the log script. Watch the lines carefully â€” one part checks length, another picks a letter. Fill the blanks correctly, or the code will self-destruct!
question4: This labyrinth is deceptive. Some letters are shadows, some numbers are decoys. Only the pattern of every third element reveals the true message. Remember, even indices hide secrets.
question5: The Phantom scattered their identity across all your previous keys. Look at the edges, skip the decoys, and collect only what's meaningful. Every character matters.
